body: New Caliper and Adiak versions. Also adds maintainers and new build variants for Caliper (cuda and libdw), removes dyninst variant (obsolete), and renames "callpath" variant to "libunwind" for consistency. Adds Adiak versions 0.2.1 and 0.3.0-alpha, git repo, and maintainers.
title: Add Caliper 2.5.0 and Adiak 0.3.0
